name: DRONE (hyperspace)
description:
Destroy the forces of the empire before they conquer the last free space stations of the galaxy.

Experience 16 levels of intense fighting against alien ships and lifeforms. Collect useful extras and coins, which you can use to upgrade your ship with a mind-boggling amount of weapons and a map to keep track of your progress.

Controls:

Thrust: Up arrow
Turn left: Left arrow
Turn Right: Right arrow
Fire: Space
Toggle map: x
Zoom map: c

Toggle full screen mode: Escape or Command-f
Quit: Command-q
